benchmark_details.name: SaRoHead (Satirical Romanian Headlines)
benchmark_details.overview: The SaRoHead dataset consists of news headlines gathered from various Romanian news outlets and a known online publication for satirical content. It is specifically designed to evaluate approaches for detecting satire in headlines.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To create a dataset for training and evaluating models that can detect satire in Romanian news headlines.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: Data collection is biased towards one source of satirical content.

data.source: Headlines scraped from Romanian news outlets and a satirical news site.
data.annotation: Distant supervision based on the source news outlet classifications.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on classifications for satire vs non-satire.
methodology.interpretation: Higher F1 scores indicate better performance in detecting satire.
methodology.validation: Evaluated through train/validation/test splits with balanced sample representation.

targeted_risks.demographic_analysis: The dataset includes balanced categories (social, political, sport) for diversity.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: The data was collected in compliance with GDPR regulations.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.consent_procedures: Data sourced from publicly available headlines from news websites.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.compliance_with_regulations: The research complies with Article 3 of the European Union directive 2019/790.
